snippet.title: Altero - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Altero is an atmospheric puzzle platformer game that will tease your brain! 

Control Adi the voodoo doll and accept to sacrifice yourself in order to team up with your past. Dive deep into the darkness of the Sorrow forest and rescue the lost souls to find your peace. 

Check it out on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/567590/Altero/
